Julia Caffrey

  • Blog

Hi. I’m Julia Caffrey. I am a librarian and technologist currently living in the Boston area.

I currently work for Simmons College Library. I graduate in May with my MLIS from Simmons SLIS. In the past I taught English in Japan with the JET Program.

More information about my experiences at LinkedIn.
